tool_description: Adapts resume and cover letter language to match industry-specific terminology, jargon, and communication styles.

content.description: Resume or cover letter content to adapt

target_industry.description: Industry to adapt language for (technology, healthcare, finance, marketing, etc.)

error_messages: Empty content: Provide content to adapt for industry-specific language.
Unsupported industry: Specify a recognized industry sector for language adaptation.
Invalid role level: Use one of [entry, mid, senior, executive].
usage: Input resume or cover letter content with target industry to receive version using appropriate industry terminology and communication style.

adapted_content.description: Content revised with industry-appropriate language and terminology

terminology_changes.description: Specific terms and phrases that were adapted for the industry

industry_alignment_score.description: How well the adapted content matches industry standards (0-100)
